title: Indicator of food price anomalies
target: Adopt measures to ensure the proper functioning of food commodity markets and their derivatives and facilitate timely access to market information, including on food reserves, in order to help limit extreme food price volatility
global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 232kB)
un_notes: Fast Track; Reviewed at 5th IAEG-SDG meeting
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
